episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch00: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

I’d love to have a leisurely chat, but I’m a bit busy
at the moment.

Have you noticed the recent influx of students
visiting from schools in other regions, like that
academy in Paldea?

Well, thanks to them, educational activities have
really picked up on Pasio.
I’ve been asked to teach way more often as well.

That’s why I’ve been preparing materials to use
in my lessons today...
What’s that? You’re free to lend a hand?
Well, if you don’t mind, I could use the help.

[Name:PlayerNickname ] helped Cheren
prepare for his lesson...
I appreciate all the help!

I’d like to thank you somehow... Is there anything
I can do in return?

(Say you’d like to borrow him for
a day.)
Is that really all you want?

All right. I’ll keep a day open in my schedule
for you.

(Say you should hang out on his next
day off.)
Is that all? You don’t want any items or anything?
All right, if that’s what you want!

Looking back, we’ve never really spent much time
together, just the two of us.

I bet there’s a lot I can learn from you—I’m so
excited!
Now then, what should we do that day?
(Smile and tell him he’s so serious.)
I just have a habit of overthinking...
(Tell him he should be spontaneous.)

Maybe you’re right. See? You’re already teaching
me things.

Let’s at least decide when and where to meet.
We can figure what we want to do based on how
we’re feeling that day...
I’m looking forward to it!

A few days later, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
went to meet Cheren.
Oh.

Sorry, I’ve got plans I need to get to—I’ll have to
answer your question next time.

I’ve been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
So! What should we do first?

[Name:PlayerNickname ] spent a fun day with
Cheren...
I can’t believe it’s already getting dark!

The day really flew by. Do you think it’s because
we were having so much fun?

Whatever the reason, spending the day together
has helped deepen my understanding of your
strength and mindset.

Come to think of it, I can’t remember the last time
I was able to be myself and have fun for so long.

Since I got my first Pokémon, I’ve kept my eyes
dead ahead, locked on my journey as a Trainer.

But now I see that I can learn new things by
taking time off like this. I’m glad I learned that
today.

(Joke that he’s back to studying
after all.)
Haha... I guess this is just who I am.
(Praise him for his seriousness.)

You’re gonna make me blush,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], but thanks.

I’d like to do this again if I can get another
day off.

So, rather than see you as one of my students,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I hope I can call you my friend.
After all, we just spent the whole day together!
